TopicTitle: Fulfilled the reqs of the tourist contract, still says incomplete

Articles.Content:
ANyone?

Edited September 16, 2015 by CosmicCharlie

Not from that pic no, we'd have to see the contract as it is displayed in flight or the editor, it'll show what is complete in green.

Or you can just flag it as complete in the alt+12 debug screen.
Did you bring them home? I am pretty sure the tourist contracts won't complete until everybody's back on Kerbin, perhaps even recovered.

Did you bring them home? I am pretty sure the tourist contracts won't complete until everybody's back on Kerbin, perhaps even recovered.

Yeh this.

I share your perplexity tho. Lately I've been having problems with contracts to gather science from particular buildings round KSC (mod). Annoyingly it doesn't specify whether to be on the ground next to the building or on the roof of the building, and it does seem to matter.
Figured it out. You have to click the little green check boxes. So I'm a dummy. So what?

Figured it out. You have to click the little green check boxes. So I'm a dummy. So what?

Sorry?! We have to click the little green check boxes? I don't get it, are you joking?

Figured it out. You have to click the little green check boxes. So I'm a dummy. So what?

Click the check which what huh?
